text: Yariguíes National Park (Spanish: Serranía de los Yariguíes) is a natural park in north central Colombia. It is in the Santander department and it is in size. It was made into a national natural park in 2005. ==Related pages== * Cerulean Warbler Bird Reserve * List of national parks of Colombia ==References== ==Other websites== * Bird species of Yariguíes National Park Category:National parks in Colombia Category:Santander Department
title: Yariguíes National Park
